topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d8daf636872407e000ee2#post_559d8daf636872407e000ee2
[bq="hype"]yeah i keep getting flak because of my previous choices b/c depression

like shit the reason i've been holing myself in my room is because i wanna kill myself, but it's not like i can just casually say something like that. they'd freak

and yknow when they say that i havent been trying to get a job like im worthless and other implications it doesn't help my situation too much. man i felt like _hell_ a couple of days ago because my dad and his gf were telling me how i was gunna end up in a homeless shelter soon and i just couldn't shake the thought of wanting to bite a bullet before then

now that i've been cheered up however i'm planning on changing that but they still pry and pry

rly irritating[/bq]
Does your school have a psychologist or such?  I've gone through similar shit and there's always at least one good counselor on staff that isn't a idiot.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d8e49636872407e000f9e#post_559d8e49636872407e000f9e
And the crazy thing is my parents act like as if I'd be an idiot to move out. 
"Oh, you know what's better than $200-something a month? Free rent."
Hey, you know what's better than free rent? Not listening to your critical ass all day long and walking the line between fine and depressed because you keep fucking talking down to me like I'm never gonna make it in life.

It's funny, actually. When I was younger, I liked my mom more than my dad, but now that I'm older, I respect him hella more than her. He may still criticize me, but at least he does it with stuff to back it up. She just does it whenever I do a screw-up, even if I've screwed up on a thing that I'm usually good at.
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d8f746368725b71000b13#post_559d8f746368725b71000b13
i'm out of school brew

had one that was a shit though, i was assigned one because i got angry one time and almost did jail time soooooooye i believe that the stigma of that was in the air

all she did was make me aware that i was indeed depressed and well that didn't help much lel

and as much as i'd like to be able to trust someone, i think i have the capacity to fix this myself. i may be a little slow but i do come to realizations eventually
